Name: Shannon Elroy Clay
Description:
Shannon was stabbed multiple times, allegedly by Robert Surdaca Rice, Gerald Julian Chandler, and Robert Lee Allgood.

> A second suspect has been charged with murder in the stabbing death of a [trans woman] in a Greenville hotel room in September.
>
> Eighteen-year-old Gerald Julian "Skeet" Chandler, of 155 Ridge St., was charged with murder and armed robbery Wednesday, according to warrants.
>
> A 14-year-old earlier was arrested in connection with the slaying, and more charges are expected as the investigation continues, police said.
>
> Chandler was being held in the Greenville County Detention Center on an unrelated second-degree lynching charge. He still was in the detention center Thursday awaiting a bond hearing on the new charges.
>
> Blood on the window of a room at the Budget Inn on Pendleton Street Sept. 25 led investigators to the nude body of Shannon Elroy Clay, a 29-year-old convicted [sex worker].
>
> Clay had been stabbed several times in the back, with the knife still embedded in [her] back left shoulder.
>
> Two weeks later, police arrested a 14-year-old Tanglewood Middle School student and charged him with murder. 
>
> The case, which might end up being tried before a circuit judge, is pending.
>
> Warrants against Chandler charge that Clay was killed for $700.
